### Added
- Set `aws.giantswarm.io/vpc-mode` annotation on AWSCluster.
- Set cluster to paused when vpcMode is set to private.
### Changed
- Updated to Kubernetes 1.22.15
- Updated to using Ubuntu 22.04 as base OS
